title: Luxury Real Estate Platform
description: A premium real estate platform featuring advanced property listings, 3D tours, and virtual staging capabilities.
shortDescription: Premium real estate platform with 3D tours
problem: High-end property agents needed a sophisticated platform that showcased luxury homes with immersive experiences.
solution: Built a custom web platform with interactive 3D tours, advanced filtering, and seamless property management.
imageAlt: Luxury real estate platform interface showing property listings
impact: Increased property inquiries by 45% within first quarter
testimonial: Yal delivered a stunning platform that our clients absolutely love.

title: Fintech Analytics Dashboard
description: A comprehensive financial analytics dashboard with real-time data visualization and portfolio management.
problem: Financial professionals needed real-time insights with complex data visualizations.
solution: Designed and developed an intuitive dashboard with interactive charts, real-time updates, and custom analytics.
imageAlt: Fintech dashboard with charts and analytics
impact: Reduced analysis time by 60% for users
testimonial: The dashboard has transformed how our team analyzes financial data.

title: Sustainable Fashion E-commerce
description: An eco-friendly fashion brand e-commerce platform promoting sustainable shopping practices.
problem: A sustainable fashion brand needed an e-commerce solution aligned with their environmental values.
solution: Created a beautiful, performant e-commerce site with sustainability tracking and eco-friendly checkout.
testimonial: The site perfectly captures our brand and sustainable values.

title: AI-Powered Fitness App
description: A mobile fitness application with AI-powered workout recommendations and progress tracking.
problem: Users wanted personalized fitness guidance without expensive personal trainers.
solution: Developed an AI-driven fitness app with personalized workouts, form detection, and community features.
imageAlt: Mobile fitness app interface with workout tracking
testimonial: This app changed my fitness journey completely.

title: Nonprofit Management System
description: A comprehensive management system for nonprofits handling donations, volunteers, and impact tracking.
problem: Nonprofits struggled with managing volunteers, donations, and impact reporting across multiple tools.
solution: Built an integrated platform for volunteer management, donation tracking, and impact analytics.
testimonial: This system has saved our organization thousands of hours annually.
